notes.body: Hello Uttam,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #657013180470042624-66358, I am sorry to know you have not received the medicine you ordered, IADDPHOS SACHET OF 3.2GM GRANULES, quantities of 8. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologise for the inconvenience caused to you.     I am highlighting your concern to the Escalation team, and our team will investigate it. If the medicine is found to be missing, the refund amount of Rs. 146.96 will be initiated. Post initiation of refund, the amount will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet in 24 hours.     You can expect the resolution within 24 to 48 hours. We will get back to you with an update once we receive it.      Further, was the parcel intact, or was there any damage from the outside at the time of delivery?     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Habiba

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hi Team,

I placed an order on *25th November* and followed up with your team *10–12
times* on *6th and 7th December*, yet no one was able to help. The order
was sitting in your *Rajpur facility* from *2nd to 6th December*—which is
hardly 20 minutes from my address and has delivered to me in the past.

I clearly told your team that I could *arrange pickup myself* if you simply
shared the facility address, but the address was never provided. Instead,
after *10 days*, the order was simply cancelled without any proactive
communication.
If you cannot deliver to a location, this should be informed
immediately—not after multiple rounds of follow-ups. Cancelling and
refunding after so long is the easiest solution for your team but extremely
frustrating for the customer.

I have been a loyal customer, placing orders *every month* and giving
PharmEasy *₹1 lakh+ business every year for the last two years*. This is
not how loyal customers should be treated.

I made numerous calls, and despite promises, *no call-backs ever came*.
Please review the recorded calls. These medicines were for my *senior
citizen parents*, and the lack of support put me in a helpless
situation—hence this escalation.

If you offer any *premium membership or priority support*, please let me
know. I am willing to subscribe to ensure smoother service in the future.

I genuinely hope that someone from *senior leadership* reviews this
complaint and ensures that customers do not face such issues again.

Due to this experience, I will no longer place my full monthly order with
PharmEasy. I will split orders across competitors such as *Netmeds*, *1MG*,
etc., to reduce the risk of delivery failure.

Thanks,
*Aman D.*

--

notes.body: Hello Aman,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  Thank you for your time on the call. Pursuant to our conversation, PharmEasy wishes to provide the best service to its customers. It was never our intention to disappoint you by any means. We agree that you have faced a lot of trouble until now, and we apologise for the same.      As a gesture of goodwill, Rs. 150 will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet within 24-72 hours. This amount does not have an expiry, and you can use the same in your next order.       For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.  Regards, Grievance Officer HelpDesk. ​

notes.body: Hello Imran,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  We understand your concern in regard to order #6203925.   ​  Please see the attached invoice copy for your reference. You can also get the same from our app/website. To get the invoice for your order(s), go to "My orders," tap on the respective order, and you will find an option to download the invoice in a PDF format.      In the future, please contact our Level 1 customer service team via a call to 8071324888 or send an email to care@pharmeasy.in. If your query remains unresolved for 7 days after you have reached out to our Level 1 Customer support, you can escalate the matter to us.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.  Regards, Grievance Officer HelpDesk. ​
notes.body_html:
Hello Imran,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We understand your concern in regard to order #6203925.  
​
Please see the attached invoice copy for your reference. You can also get the same from our app/website. To get the invoice for your order(s), go to "My orders," tap on the respective order, and you will find an option to download the invoice in a PDF format. 

In the future, please contact our Level 1 customer service team via a call to 8071324888 or send an email to care@pharmeasy.in. If your query remains unresolved for 7 days after you have reached out to our Level 1 Customer support, you can escalate the matter to us. 
 
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.

Regards,
Grievance Officer HelpDesk. ​

notes.body: Hello Anshul,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your order #657813472360214528-74145, We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the EVERHERB (BY PHARMEASY) FLAXSEED OMEGA 3 - ESSENTIAL FATTY ACIDS - HEALTHY HEART - BOTTLE OF 60   on 15th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.     Please note that the medicine will be collected within 24 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 48 business hours. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account within 7-10 business days.     We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Anshul,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your order #657813472360214528-74145, We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the EVERHERB (BY PHARMEASY) FLAXSEED OMEGA 3 - ESSENTIAL FATTY ACIDS - HEALTHY HEART - BOTTLE OF 60   on 15th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.
 
Please note that the medicine will be collected within 24 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 48 business hours. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account within 7-10 business days.
 
We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
 
We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body_html:
Hello,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
With regards to your order #658047495317557248-70606, I see that due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order was delivered to you on 13th December 2025 at 12:32 PM. I have jotted down the details of your experience, and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. 
​
We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.

Regards,
Manisha
